title: The One About Drag Con
itunes:author: Sibling Rivalry & Studio71
content:encoded:
This year's Drag Con and revving up and Bob and Monét sit down to reminisc on Drag Con pasts. The two reflect on how Drag Con has changed over the years and give an insight into booths, panels, and behind the scenes secrets!!

Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
